idea-plugin.name: IDEA Jetty Runner
idea-plugin.description:
A plugin that allows you to quickly run Jetty from IntelliJ IDEA CE.
If you require full support please consider buying the Enterprise Edition.
This plugin should be Win / Mac / Linux compatible - target JDK5.
tags: jetty, container, webapp, runner, tomcat
